testcase.name: Scenario Outline: Check Forgot Password
testcase.system-out:
Feature: OOTB. Login Scenario Outline: Check Forgot Password
Given the app is running () * I press "Log in" button () * I should see "Sign in" label () * I press a "Forgot Your Password?" label () * I should see "ENTER YOUR EMAIL" label () * I enter "<input>" email () * I press a "Send" button () * I should see "<output>" notification ()
